books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.
books.name: VERITY

books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: The new general manager of a hotel far from its Gilded Age heyday deals with the complicated pasts of her guests and staff.
books.name: THE HOTEL NANTUCKET

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Tate Collins and Miles Archer, an airline pilot, think they can handle a no strings attached arrangement. But they can't.
books.name: UGLY LOVE

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.name: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: by Emily Henry
books.description: While on vacation in North Carolina, a literary agent keeps running into an editor.
books.name: BOOK LOVERS

books.author: by James Patterson and David Ellis
books.description: The third book in the Billy Harney thriller series. Detective Harney goes after a billionaire crime boss and a prison escape artist.
books.name: ESCAPE

books.author: by Riley Sager
books.description: An actress escaping bad press goes to a Vermont lake house and uncovers secrets within a neighboring couple’s marriage.
books.name: THE HOUSE ACROSS THE LAKE

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Is Ben using his relationship with Fallon as fodder for his novel?
books.name: NOVEMBER 9

books.author: by Emily Henry
books.description: Opposites Poppy and Alex meet to vacation together one more time in hopes of saving their relationship.
books.name: PEOPLE WE MEET ON VACATION

books.author: by Carley Fortune
books.description: The love story of Percy and Sam is told over the course of six summers and one weekend.
books.name: EVERY SUMMER AFTER

books.author: by Emily Henry
books.description: A relationship develops between a literary fiction author and a romance novelist as they both try to overcome writer’s block.
books.name: BEACH READ

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: An epic party has serious outcomes for four famous siblings.
books.name: MALIBU RISING
